data.eml:eml: The family Hydropsychidae Curtis (Trichoptera) in the Ryukyu Archipelago, southwestern Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ito, Tomiko, Nozaki, Takao (2018): The family Hydropsychidae Curtis (Trichoptera) in the Ryukyu Archipelago, southwestern Japan. Zootaxa 4504 (4): 545-565, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.4.6
